page.title: 16HYDRO-ELECTRICITY ON EDAY
page.content: It was only five yearts ago that mains electricity came to Eday. Before that time most people had their own generators to make enough electricity for their own use. This was a very expensive way of producing electricity. The coming of the Hydro has been a great help to many people on Eday. Farmers can have lights in their barns and they can shear sheep more easily. In our school we have T.V.s,computers,a phot-copier, and a video player. If we did not have mains electricity all these things would not work. Mains electricity coming to Eday was a great joy to the people. There is a small sub-station on the West Side of the island and the power cables leave Eday at Fersness Bay and go underwater to Westray.
